title: Compose fails in Fedora 31
body:
Hi all,

I am following the instructions on Fedora 31:
```bash
$ git clone https://github.com/doccano/doccano.git
$ cd doccano
$ podman-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up
```

The containers seem to build and run, however the nginx container returns only status 500 (internal server error). And I have the feeling that its /var/www folder is empty (I cannot start a bash in the container).
